properties.name: ws.config.git_remote_name
properties.description: Name of remote git repository. Default: origin.

properties.name: ws.config.git_remote_url
properties.description: Location for remote git repository. By default is not configured.

properties.name: ws.config.minified
properties.description: Flag that controls the format of saved files. Default: false

properties.name: ws.config.max_upload_file_size
properties.description: Max size (mb) of uploaded file. Default: 10
